name: Air Golf League
description:
Welcome to our newest game (and the second one), we created this game with an objective in mind, and that objective was clone another game, but when we try to make the other game, we cant make it.

Thats why we do this game.

This game came to our mind thinking about the death minigame on Bomberman 5, and we made this game.

With this  game we try to create a "future-like" sport, we combined air hockey and golf (kinda), and thats how Air Golf League came to life, your only goal its make the Disc go to the goal, thats all

Controls:

Directional Arrows - Move your character.

Spacebar - Shot the air.
